about_the_game:
This game is a visual novel game consisting of adult-oriented animation of a devil girl.
Despite her big rack and sexual appearance, she is innocent at heart!
Enjoy sex with the youkai girl "Nue" through smooth animation with voicing and sfx!

* The censoring in the retail version is smaller than shown in the demo

We've given this product a discount price as an introduction to our works! Enjoy!

Contents:

Prologue + 2 scenes (fingering / sex)
10 video files
Erotic voicing / sfx included
1280x720 30fps

Switch between scenes with 1 click

* Please confirm system compatibility via the trial version before purchasing.

(Text: English / Voice: Japanese)
(Text: 中文/ Voice: 日语)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a sex scene with a devil girl.
May not be suitable for all ages, including nudity, mild violence, non-consensual sex, coarse language, fully nude women and men, sexual conversation, sexual content, and general adult content. Contains content or content that may not be suitable for viewing at work.
All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
In addition,the video file used in the game is included in the local file.
